short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop in Dollars and Pay in Naira with Shiip+

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to an easy, reliable, and effective way to shop for all your items abroad while still in Nigeria, and pay in Naira.

Pay in Naira

Shop most US stores and pay in Naira with USSD, Bank Transfer, Card, QR codes, and more


Save on Shipping

From fast to cheap, You get a wide range of shipping options to bring your item to your doorstep in Nigeria


Transparent Process

From purchase to delivery, you can find all the information about your items on our mobile app.
